gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustmentsDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Direct`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_AdjustmentsDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA12_AdjustmentsDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustmentsReconcileNetResult` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Direct`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_AdjustmentsReconcileNetResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA7_AdjustmentsReconcileNetResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustmentsReconcileNetResult` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit7_AdjustmentsReconcileNetResult')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit7_AdjustmentsReconcileNetResult return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit7_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileNetResultDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit7_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileNetResultDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit7_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileNetResultCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit7_ChildrenOfAdjustmentsReconcileNetResultCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowFinancingActivities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_CashFlowFinancingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_CashFlowFinancingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowFinancingActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowFinancingActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowFinancingActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfCashFlowFinancingActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowFromOperations` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashFlowFromOperations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashFlowFromOperations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowFromOperationsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowFromOperationsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowFromOperationsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowFromOperationsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowInvestingActivities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit5_CashFlowInvestingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit5_CashFlowInvestingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit5_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestingActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit5_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestingActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit5_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestingActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit5_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestingActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Indirect`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA16_CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax` SHOULD be equal to + `CashFlowFromOperations` + `IncreaseDecreaseOperationalActivities`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables2_CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables2_CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables2_CashFlowFromOperations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables2_CashFlowFromOperations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables2_IncreaseDecreaseOperationalActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables2_IncreaseDecreaseOperationalActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowOperatingActivities` SHOULD be equal to + `CashFlowFromOperations` + `IncreaseDecreaseOperationalActivities` - `IncomeTaxPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_CashFlowOperatingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_CashFlowOperatingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_CashFlowFromOperations')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_CashFlowFromOperations return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_IncreaseDecreaseOperationalActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_IncreaseDecreaseOperationalActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_IncomeTaxPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST103Variables1_IncomeTaxPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowOperatingActivities` SHOULD be equal to + `CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax` - `IncomeTaxPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables1_CashFlowOperatingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables1_CashFlowOperatingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables1_CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables1_CashFlowOperatingActivitiesBeforeTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables1_IncomeTaxPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtFST102Variables1_IncomeTaxPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowStatementMethodType` MUST exist at least once, because `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA2_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA2_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowStatementMethodType` MUST exist at least once, because `CashFlowFinancingActivities` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA3_CashFlowFinancingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA3_CashFlowFinancingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowStatementMethodType` MUST exist at least once, because `EffectExchangeRateChangesCashAndCashEquivalents` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA4_EffectExchangeRateChangesCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA4_EffectExchangeRateChangesCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowStatementMethodType` MUST exist at least once, because `IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA5_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA5_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowStatementMethodType` MUST exist at least once, because `NetCashFlows` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA1_NetCashFlows')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtExistenceThnExistenceCovA1_NetCashFlows return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashFlowsOperatingActivitiesOther` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Indirect`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA8_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA8_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA8_CashFlowsOperatingActivitiesOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA8_CashFlowsOperatingActivitiesOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CommissionsPaid` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Indirect`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA17_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA17_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA17_CommissionsPaid')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA17_CommissionsPaid return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CommissionsReceived` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Indirect`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_CommissionsReceived')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementBanks_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA4_CommissionsReceived return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
